title: Wikimania 2014 London Guidebook
name: London Wall
image: https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:London Wall bastion, Barber Surgeons' Hall Gardens, London EC2.jpg
content: Remains of the wall that surrounded the City of London for almost two thousand years. The parts around the Barbican are mostly Tudor due to maintenance (Roman remains can be seen in and around the Tower of London). Other local remains are the
